items.sentence: I believe that Tom wouldn't be capable of doing such a thing.
Why do you think Tom is reluctant to play volleyball with us?
I'm trying to convince myself that I'm doing the right thing.
If you don't have a flashlight, I could lend you one of mine.
Everybody in the room did the same thing over and over again.
Tom was going to ask Mary to do that, but asked John instead.
Tom's best friend was a stray dog that he found on the beach.
Did you remember to mail the letter that I asked you to mail?
Do you believe global warming is the result of human actions?
An electric guitar doesn't sound the same as an acoustic one.
